org.mobicents.slee.container.management.jmx
Interface CongestionControlConfigurationMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
CongestionControlConfiguration
public interface CongestionControlConfigurationMBean

JMX Interface for the configuration of the congestion control module.

Author:
martins

Method Summary
 int getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOff()
          Retrieves the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn off congestion control.
 int getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn()
          Retrieves the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn on congestion control.
 int getPeriodBetweenChecks()
          Retrieves the period in seconds to check if congestion control state should change.
 boolean isRefuseFireEvent()
          Indicates if the firing of an event should be refused, when congestion control is on.
 boolean isRefuseStartActivity()
          Indicates if the start of activity should be refused, when congestion control is on.
 void setMinFreeMemoryToTurnOff(int minFreeMemoryToTurnOff)
          Sets the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn off congestion control.
 void setMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn(int minFreeMemoryToTurnOn)
          Sets the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn on congestion control.
 void setPeriodBetweenChecks(int periodBetweenChecks)
          Sets the period in seconds to check if congestion control state should change.
 void setRefuseFireEvent(boolean refuseFireEvent)
          Defines if the firing of an event should be refused, when congestion control is on.
 void setRefuseStartActivity(boolean refuseStartActivity)
          Defines if the start of activity should be refused, when congestion control is on.
 

Method Detail

getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn

int getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn()
Retrieves the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn on congestion control.

Returns:

setMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn

void setMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn(int minFreeMemoryToTurnOn)
Sets the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn on congestion control.

Parameters:
minFreeMemoryToTurnOn -

getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOff

int getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOff()
Retrieves the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn off congestion control.

Returns:

setMinFreeMemoryToTurnOff

void setMinFreeMemoryToTurnOff(int minFreeMemoryToTurnOff)
Sets the minimum memory (percentage) that should be available to turn off congestion control. This value should be set with respect to the value on getMinFreeMemoryToTurnOn(), a step higher so congestion control is not always turning on and off.

Parameters:
minFreeMemoryToTurnOff -

getPeriodBetweenChecks

int getPeriodBetweenChecks()
Retrieves the period in seconds to check if congestion control state should change. 0 means congestion control is off.

Returns:

setPeriodBetweenChecks

void setPeriodBetweenChecks(int periodBetweenChecks)
Sets the period in seconds to check if congestion control state should change. Use 0 to turn off congestion control.

Parameters:
periodBetweenChecks -

isRefuseStartActivity

boolean isRefuseStartActivity()
Indicates if the start of activity should be refused, when congestion control is on.

Returns:

setRefuseStartActivity

void setRefuseStartActivity(boolean refuseStartActivity)
Defines if the start of activity should be refused, when congestion control is on.

Parameters:
refuseStartActivity -

Indicates if the firing of an event should be refused, when congestion control is on.

Defines if the firing of an event should be refused, when congestion control is on.
